trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_SEQ_00<tab>The diminutive gleaner is on the lookout for an able-bodied adventurer.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_LITTLEGLEANER04176_000_001<tab>...Do my eyes deceive me, or are you <var 29 EB02 /var>?

TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_LITTLEGLEANER04176_000_002<tab>Well, as I live and breathe, it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you. Ha! I knew I'd be the first to track you down. Who's the guildship's top hunter now, eh!?

TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_LITTLEGLEANER04176_000_003<tab>Wait─you <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> heard of guildship hunts, yes? They are not so different from the hunts you're familiar with in Eorzea, as I understand it. I'd wager they're rather more challenging, but an adventurer of your caliber would never turn down a challenge, would you?
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_LITTLEGLEANER04176_000_004<tab>No, no you would not! Pray speak with Northota at the peristyle to register your interest at your earliest convenience.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_010<tab>Aye, I'm Northota. Have you come to place a bounty on an unruly beast?
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_011<tab>By the Scholar! You're <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I was half-convinced I'd set the others an impossible task, asking them to find you.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_012<tab>The gleaners' guildship has begun posting hunt bills, you see, in the hopes that capable individuals will take up arms to lighten our ever-increasing load...

TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_013<tab>Unfortunately, “capable individuals” remain the sticking point. Few hailing from our fair polis are willing to take up arms─let alone able to stand against the more fearsome specimens.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_014<tab>You, however, have the experience and the grit that we need. When I heard that you had arrived on our shores, it was music to my ears!

TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_015<tab>You needn't work for free, of course─we've done our research, and the rewards we offer are as fine as any you'll find abroad. The currency we employ is a relic of times when “gleaner” was a great deal less figurative, so you may find it somewhat...eccentric, but it's as good as gil here!

TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_016<tab>...Speaking of eccentric, it should be noted that the majority of our clients are scholars. You probably won't have heard of half the creatures they send you after, but I find it's best not to worry about that overmuch.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_017<tab>Slay beasts, collect samples─try not to think about the long-term effects of touching said samples─and get paid. Simple, no?
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_NORTHOTA_000_018<tab>That being said, I wouldn't dream of throwing you in the deep end just yet. Let's have you start off with some junior marks so you can get your feet wet.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>You are now permitted to take bills for junior marks from guildship hunt boards in Old Sharlayan and Radz-at-Han.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Defeat the monsters described on the bills and you will be rewarded with tokens that can be exchanged for exclusive items.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>To exchange tokens for exclusive items, speak with either J'lakshai in Old Sharlayan, or with Wilmetta in Radz-at-Han.
TEXT_AKTKYR201_04176_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>New quests and associate marks will become available from Northota in Old Sharlayan upon reaching level 83.
